data.actual_result: The role name is just a continous line, causing it to go way off the screen and the online number for that role is non-existent as a result.
data.expected_result: The role name line breaks, so you can see online counts.
data.short_description: Long role names are one continuous line with the online count no longer visible
data.steps_to_repro: - Set a reasonably lengthy role name that would have normally line breaked (eg Server and Twitch Moderators). - Add users to this role, ensuring the role is marked as separate on the online list. - Observe the online list.
